review_text: Great place to stay! Would love to come back again!
Would be happy to stay again!
I was pleasantly surprised, the home was cozy, the neighborhood was quiet. Jeremiah was quick to respond to any issue or questions I had. Will definitely stay here again.
Jeremiah was a great host and the house was perfect. We felt right at home. Plan on making this our go-to place when we visit our daughter in college.
Very cozy, quiet, close to Roanoke, clean.

We recently stayed two nights at this cozy, well-decorated home and really enjoyed it. It was clean, comfortable, had everything we needed and plenty of space for everyone to relax and enjoy their weekend. The Plex library was top-notch and the wi-fi held up to all of our devices super well! Special shoutout for the Patio recommendation -- their pizza was fantastic and reasonably priced. Thanks Jeremiah and family for an awesome AirBNB!
Very nice and comfortable. I was happy to get to stay again.
One of my fav places to stay when I’m in town. A good value for the money, a lovely kitchen that’s easy to cook in!

Very nice place. Quiet neighborhood and cozy home. The home inside is like advertised and the beds are very comfortable. The bathroom was small but still just fine enough for our needs. The bathroom sink has very small counter space but its not a deal breaker. The tv was nice and had lots of movies. The kitchen was very big and nice and had everything we needed. Everything was really nice and the home is super cozy for a fair price. I will definitely come back when i'm in the area again.
Jeremiah is a great host. My third time staying there and is always perfect for what I need.

Another quiet restful stay at Jeremiah‘s Quant place!
Fully modernized century home in the middle of beautiful Roanoke!
Great place!!! Would definitely stay here again!

The house was very tastefully done.
The home was very clean and very welcoming with adequate everything to meet our needs.
Thank you for all the extra touches and especially the snacks in the kitchen.
We would stay there again if any occasion has us in that area.
Thank yoi
It's my second time staying at jeremiah's place. It is always clean and peaceful and exactly what i needed it for.
Great place to stay, lots of snacks. Very nice place.

I stayed one night here while traveling for business. Jeremiah was friendly, helpful & responsive, even allowing me to check out an hour late, which was helpful for my schedule.
Of course, in a town like this the pickings are pretty slim. There is only one hotel in Huntington, and I do NOT recommend it. So, in perspective, this house is fine...with one glaring exception: you could not pay me to step foot in the shower. It was disturbingly gross. I would attach pix (I took some), but AirBnB doesn't allow that (which seems like a serious flaw in their system). But just trust me, it was NASTY. The rest of the house seemed fairly clean, so this was really strange. But I have a hard time not being skeeved out by everything else when the shower is this visibly gross. Also, there is no counter space in the bathroom,, which is fairly inconvenient. Otherwise, the place was just fine and served its purpose.
Great place, nice host…

I have stayed here with friends multiple
Times. EVERY time things are perfect! Clean, comfortable, convenient, small details like yummy snacks, excellent communication! We will be back for sure!
Nice place to stay in a cute little town.
Nice place, owner is very nice…

This space was lovely. Kitchen was large and well equipped. The living and dining rooms were very nice.
The downstairs bathroom was tiny but met our needs.
We would definitely stay here again.
Great location, nice house. Jeremiah is very nice to work with , easy to communicate with on anything you need.
Nice quiet place to rest.
Great location, nice house.
Niiice location, Jeremiah was easy to work with if I had questions.

We had a great stay at Jeremiah's house. It was clean, easy to find and park, great location for what we were looking for.
I wish we could have stayed longer!
Really quiet homie space. It was great!

Nice quiet quaint place in a beautiful town.
Jeremiah is a great host!

What a cozy, beautiful home close by all of the shops and restaurants in Roanoke!
Our weekend plans were rained out, so we ended up spending the whole weekend inside snuggled up with good books and movies.
The house was so lovely we didn't even mind being stuck inside for our weekend away!
We would definitely love to stay here again!
a perfect, quiet, and cozy place if you're looking to recharge your batteries.
Great stay.

Great place to stay for our quick visit to HU to visit our son. Bathroom was a bit tight and shower had a constant drip to it, but otherwise the house was very clean with many recent updates. Enjoyed the cold water and snacks that were available when we checked in.

Great house! The outside was a little deceiving but the house was great. The bathroom is pretty tiny for having three bedrooms but it fit our needs just fine. It was clean, comfortable and had everything you needed.
Very nice place to stay. It was very quite so no disturbances during the night. Very clean house. Definitely recommend staying here.

We felt right at home as soon as we walked in the house. Curl up on the reclining sofa under one of the soft blankets. The lighting is perfect. Big screen Tv with plenty of show options. The kitchen is a dream. HUGE backyard. It has quite a slope but levels out for sitting. The only issue was the driveway. You back out onto the street right at a curve. I would suggest backing into the driveway. The town’s park is in walking distance. They had water bottles in the fridge and snacks on the counter. Easy access with a lockbox. 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. It has grip bars and a seat if needed. The bed was very comfortable. We slept downstairs but there are 2 more bedrooms upstairs. The thermostat is tricky. I would ask for instructions from the host. We will definitely rent here again.
A great space for a short stay. Only one bathroom, but totally doable depending on your situation!
This was a very sweet, updated home with plenty of space for us and close to family. We are very thankful to have found it.

Another great stay at this beautiful Roanoke location.
Love relaxing in the Adirondack Chairs overlooking this beautiful back yard after a long day.
Clean house with plenty of space, comfortable living space and comfortable beds.
Great stay! The dining area was spacious and the provided snacks and water were nice!
Nice place. Great snacks and water.
We so appreciated getting to stay at Jeremiah's airbnb for a week! He was so helpful and accommodating and his house was the perfect place to stay and feel all the comfort of being 'at home.'

Our stay in Roanoke was relaxing and peaceful. The Air Bnb was organized, orderly, nicely furnished and clean. Our host Jeremiah was kind and communicated well with us…very professional Air Bnb Host. Highly recommend!!
A nice place to stay when visiting family and friends in the area. Located within minutes to entertainment and food.

This is a delightful little house that is somehow both in the middle of Roanoke and yet was so quiet. The host offered extra little surprises … like snacks and cold water. Very thoughtful! The house was clean and smelled very nice. Check in and out was extremely easy. Would definitely stay again!
The home was cute, immaculate, and contained everything we needed. The location was great, and communication was easy. I would recommend it!
Loved staying here. Everything was wonderful! House was awesome! Host was great and always answered any questions i had promptly.
RECOMMENDATIONS

Loved staying at Jeremiah's place. Very cozy and clean. I was visiting my sister and was only about two blocks from her house! Loved the fact that we were so close. I woulddefinitelyrecommend this property!

location was absolutely perfect. Me and my husband had sold their home and were in the process of buying another one and staying with family so we needed a night away and this home was perfect for stress-free environment and a kick back and relax. Jeremiah was very helpful The Home was exactly as described. The snacks on the counter in the complementary coffee and tea was a wonderful surprise would definitely recommend this to anyone
The house was clean and accommodating. Jeremiah was a great host and answered questions quickly.
Welcoming, clean home with plenty of towels, blankets, and extras such as a goodie basket and spices.
Nice spacious beautifully renovated house in a magical town!

The girls and I needed a get away weekend and this was the right way to do it! The town had all the things we wanted and needed to do. The house was close to everything and super easy to get into. The house was cute and filled the needs we had. Really enjoyed the stay.
Thank you for a great stay! Beautiful place!
Perfect space for what we needed!

We had booked for a girls weekend trip & this place & Roanoke we're just perfect! The house was just as described, also very cute, very clean & welcoming!! One nice touch was the snacks, bottled water & some breakfast items to eat in the morning. That was really nice since there are not a lot of breakfast choices in Roanoke. Roanoke is a great getaway for a girls trip, lots of cute boutiques & eateries! It's also just a nice relaxing little town! Highly recommend staying here!
Great place!

Was grateful to find a last minute place to stay in Roanoke, as the town was quaint and very friendly. Jeremiah was very quick to respond with the couple questions that I had. Would definitely stay there again.

We had a wonderful time at Jeremiah's place. It was exactly as it was described and Jeremiah was a great host. The home was perfect for what we needed. The kitchen had everything and all appliances were newly replaced. He even put out snacks on the counter for us and water bottles in fridge. It was a very cozy home that gave you the home away from home feeling. We will definitely visit again. Thank you Jeremiah!

Great place in Roanoke! Cozy, comfortable, felt homey. The beds were so comfortable! Nicely set up kitchen, host had snacks, water and breakfast items, which were a nice touch. We were given flexibility in a late check out which let us have extra time to see out of town friends. Thank you for your hospitality!
Nice clean and cozy place in a lovely town
Cozy place, well decorated and clean. Breakfast amenities were included and that was really nice. Warm even in a bitter winter.
Very nice house. I'll definitely stay again. Thank you for your hospitality!
Very enjoyable stay!
Peaceful and lovely!! We enjoyed our time there immensely!

Beautiful older home. Free of clutter so was nice since we were traveling with younger children. Would recommend that they get the shower fixed because it drips and also install a motion sensor light outside since we arrived in the dark and there was not a porch light. Would recommend and will stay there again!

our 2nd time staying and everything was perfect! we got an early check in to enjoy the space even longer. lots of snacks provided and a well stocked kitchen. beds are super comfy. would definitely recommend staing here if you are in the area. roanoke is a great little town to spend the day in!

This is the perfect place if you’d like somewhere that’s close to walk to eat or shop! Everything was extremely clean and the hosts were very thoughtful, even leaving us bottled water in the fridge and a bowl of snacks in the kitchen! The only downside was that there was not access to closets in any of the rooms and the water temperature was a bit on the warm side. Huge backyard with great views!

This place is probably suitable for 1 person, or a couple, but definitely not for a family stay. The bathroom situation is not good. Very tiny with no tub for kids. The shower head is awful and drips constantly 24/7. The shower curtain is not installed properly thus creating a huge challenge to keep all of the water within the shower surround. While the house was generally clean, the linens did not smell fresh and we fought allergy issues for the entire stay. There is no outdoor lighting for the parking area. You will have to load/unload in the dark if you are coming and/or going after dusk. The door locks do not all function properly, so we were unable to completely secure the home while we were gone. The kitchen was functional yet underwhelming. The lack of a dishwasher makes for more work if you plan on cooking at the home. I think it's fair to say our expectations were not met for a family stay.

Wonderful cozy home with a great kitchen in a peaceful loving town.
Great restaurants and shopping within easy walking distance.
This place was amazing! So cute, just like listing. Jeremiah was great with communication. Good/shopping so close!
this was a great place to stay! the surrounding area and activities are so nice. the downtown area is full of cuteness. jeremiah made the whole process so easy.
very lovely home. Jeremiah was a excellent host and downtown was very nice and had good restaurants to eat at. Would definitely stayed there again

The place was exactly what the listing showed and was perfect for our trip! Very nice furniture and comfortable beds, and walking distance away from local shops and restaurants on Main Street in a quiet, peaceful town.
Great house to stay in, it was well kept and extremely clean upon arrival. You get what you see and it’s more than what you pay for. Highly recommended.

Perfect stay for a girls weekend away! Check-in was a breeze! The house is easy to find in a nice quiet neighborhood conveniently located between Fort Wayne and Huntington so lots of options of restaurants and activities nearby. The house was very clean and decorated very cute and comfy just as the pictures show. The beds and furniture were so comfortable we enjoyed our downtime just relaxing at the house just as much as we did our planned activities! The big bowl of various snacks and freezer of breakfast foods were an added bonus! I highly recommend staying here if you need a nice, clean, cute and comfy stay at a very reasonable rate!
Beautifully decorated and great view!
This was such a cute home! The beds were comfy, the extra snacks were a nice surprise. Everything was smooth and easy from check in to check out! If you stay in Roanoke- this is a great value!

The house was easy to find, updated and private. I stayed on the main floor and found the bed and pillows to be really comfortable. I slept great on the quiet road that was walkable to the lovely downtown area. It felt very safe.
I almost didn’t choose this gem because of someone else’s review of the bathroom saying how tiny it was. It really was fine. It had a full size ceiling, tub-sized shower with good water pressure, a full size toilet, room for dirty laundry and a small sink. I was able to move comfortably without banging into anything.
Jeremiah was easy to communicate with and invited me to message with any problems or questions. The kitchen was beautifully updated and stocked with seasonings, coffee, olive oil, dishes, cookware, appliances and anything you may need! Very thoughtful!
Great stay and great little town! I highly recommend this house!
Very nice stay. I wish I would have had more time to enjoy it

Nicely remodeled house in a quiet neighborhood in wonderful Roanoke.
Highly recommend it!
the house was beautiful! definitely a homey vibe, felt very comfortable. host was very friendly and quick with communication!! 10/10!!!
Roanoke is a very nice small town. Took morning and evening walks and never felt insecure. Restaurants were good and everyone in town was very hospitable

Jeremiah’s was very nice! The check in process was easy, the house was clean, and the location was charming. He provided water and snacks, as well as some toiletries. The only complaint was the bathroom was small for 5 people to share. There are mirrors in every bedroom though for getting ready.
Great quiet home away from home! Jeremiah is an excellent host!

great space. safe quiet neighbor hood in walking distance to anything in downtown roanoke. the host provided snacks, fresh made ice and breakfast items! that was a nice surprise. the space is well decorated, comfortable and clean. plenty of room for family and friends. easy to find, easy check in and checkout. will definitely be back!
Was beautiful and peaceful, decorated very nice
Great value for this clean and thoughtfully furnished home. Thanks Jeremiah!
Great place!! Very clean and cozy!
Great peaceful stay

Jeremiah had great prompt communication with us the entire time; even when our plans changed, he was very flexible and accommodating. The location was great with being so close to Roanoke Main Street. Beds were very comfortable and the place even had private parking. Would highly recommend.

The home is very clean and well kept. We were in town for a college visit and it was close to everything. Communication was great. Jeremiah left snacks and goodies for our stay. We would definitely recommend staying!
super clean and cozy and close enough to walk down town and get food it was perfect

This is a comfortable, wonderful home with charm and character. It definitely deserves its 5 out of 5 stars. We found it very clean and ready for us, with some pleasant surprises like snacks and starter food! It is obvious that the hosts put care into choosing the furnishings. The kitchen is the most stocked we have ever had. It's rare to find as nice of knife set, coffee maker, toaster, silverware, cooking equipment as this house has...and we utilized all of those things during our stay. The beds are very comfortable, the bathroom towels are fluffy and nice, and we even took note how comfy the throw blankets in the living room were, and used them quite a bit! The layout was perfect for our family of 6. The wifi was extremely fast. Just a couple notes that may help future guests: the bathroom is small (note this did not bother us at all). We knew it was an older remodeled home and it was what we would expect. Also their listing does clearly state there is not laundry so we knew ahead of time, but on a longer stay, that would be a challenge. Again, it was not a problem at all for this 5 night stay. The host was an excellent communicator and the check in / out process was seamless. We were 100% satisfied, even impressed, and we will be back!
Great communication and quick responses.

Jeremiah keeps a very clean, cozy house! Check-in was incredibly quick and easy. The beds are very comfortable, and there’s plenty of blankets and pillows. There were little snacks left in the kitchen, and water in the fridge. The cost was also incredibly fair, definitely well worth it!!

This house was wonderful! It has all the necessities and more. Our hosts thought of everything we could need, and they communicated efficiently and professionally. I would suggest bringing a fan for the bedroom if you sleep warm (it's all air conditioned, but with older houses, air movement can be restricted sometimes). This place is a stone's throw from some fun shopping, great eateries, an amazing winery, and in just a few minutes, you can get to larger cities.
Check it out, and you won't be disappointed!

This home was impeccably clean! The beds and pillows were very comfortable, the Wi-Fi reliable, & the air conditioning fully functioning. There was plenty of hot water, plenty of bath and kitchen towels, nice snacks and water provided, and nice new dishes, appliances, and cooking utensils. It has a comfortable and inviting atmosphere with very calm and pleasant decor.
The host, Jeremiah, was very responsive to our inquiries.
This place was great. Jeremiah was great. Value was great.

This house was excellent! It was so clean, and, though it's not listed as an amenity, Jeremiah provided little snacks and waters and things. Just a note, the bathroom is SMALL. It was EXTREMELY clean, and we enjoyed it, but if you're looking for a luxurious bathroom, this isn't it. Again, the amenities included were great! Fluffy towels, shampoo, conditioner, and body wash. The kitchen, on the other hand, is HUGE. They provide pots, pans, and seasonings. It was a great base of operations for our vacation.
The house was really clean, the furnishings were super comfy, and the neighborhood was quiet. My three boys LOVED it, and my husband and I enjoyed the privacy that comes with getting a whole house.
Really nice place. Very quiet & perfect for me and my friends. exactly like the pictures.

We had a great stay, the house was clean and well maintained. The kitchen had everything we needed there were even snacks for us to enjoy. The beds were comfy too. The host was very quick to respond to any questions I had. 10/10 would recommend and stay again.

Nice spacious, clean private house in a quiet neighborhood just blocks away from a small downtown area that has more great dining options than towns many, many times Roanoke’s size—I tried and enjoyed three of them! Also close to Fort Wayne & Huntington, both of which were important to me on this trip. Good communication.
House was great. Had everything that we needed. We didn’t spend much time in the house though. We were impressed with the stuff to do in Roanoke. Thumbs up!

Very nice place to stay. Clean, everything you need is provided, owners went above and beyond to make the stay comfortable, even including various food items like frozen breakfast sandwiches. Nice location, quite area, I talked to a neighbor lady and she was very nice. Nothing bad to say about any aspect of this stay, THANK YOU!
Super clean! Awesome furnishings! Wonderful place to stay! Would have loved a outdoor area to sit.
Great place to stay in a a quiet neighborhood.
Thank you!
Place was very cool and super clean

This host makes you feel like you’re a family member visiting. The home has been updated and taken care of to a very high standard. Very thoughtful host that provides amenities(shampoo, bottled water, etc)that really allows you to focus on the point of the stay instead of running to stores. Old town Roanoke was nice also. Nice public park in walking distance with playground and baseball fields. Airport is 15 min away. The host is more than responsive to your messages before, during, and after the stay. I would book it again if my work takes me back to this area. 110%
Lovely, quiet, and clean home!

We couldn’t have asked for a better place to stay during our basketball tournament. From the beginning the host made accommodations for us to add a day to our stay. Then the stay was made exceptional by the small details such as snacks, fully stocked kitchen and toiletries. I was with teenagers so they had no interest going into town but it was a few blocks from a cute little downtown area. We stay at Air BnB frequently and this was one of the best!
nice clean place we felt right at home. easy instructions would visit again

This quiet place was just what we were looking for while staying in Indiana. Everything was just as it was listed and our family had a wonderful stay! They even had pamphlets with areas we could go if we wanted to! The house was thoughtfully decorated and we enjoyed our time there!
Didn’t get to do much around the town I was there for work. The house was great
Thank you
Excellent host

We had a wonderful stay. The house was just as pictured, had all of the basic amenities we needed for our stay and was very clean. We met Candie and she was very friendly and helpful. We will be returning guests in the future!

We spent 3 weeks at this location. I cant say enough about our lodging and hosts. Candie was awesome to deal with. Our place with just as described and was as big and nice as the pictures showed. It was worth the money.
Do not hesitate to stay. I will again no doubt.
Wabash is a beautiful and scenic area. Im looking forward to doing more work in that area.

Everything was as advertised and better!
Hosts are great to talk to and personable.
Everything was exactly as described, absolutely spotless. So close to where we wanted to be. Definitely recommend. We will be back for sure.

Amazing little “retreat” in a beautiful and charming location, all within the city limits of a small river town.
Kurt and Heidi are absolutely wonderful hosts.
I will certainly be back to The Shed Resort again!

Such a cute little cottage type airbnb! The chickens do greet you every time you come and go! So cute! The host was so nice too and had a nice chat with her and she showed us the kitchen area in the garage. Such an adorable little place. Very clean, and smelled wonderful inside as well!!! And I love the little book where guests can write about their trip and stay while they stayed here, such a cute idea!

Kurt and Heidi go above and beyond to make you feel welcomed and comfortable. There was meticulous care to provide a very clean environment and they even left a couple of cupcakes with a small hand written note, which was very appreciated. Due to an unfortunate incident on our end, we were only able to stay a couple of hours and didn't get to complete our stay as planned, but in the short time we were there, we really enjoyed this little goat shed turned mini home. Listening to the creek babble while sitting outside was our favorite part. There was also a very friendly cat who did his part to make us feel right at home and the chickens out front were a nice touch too.

Only needed one night but had a great sleep. Very relaxing setting, Kurt and Heidi have an awesome piece of land and they provide everything you need for an enjoyable stay. Highly recommend if in the area, a very peaceful place.
Great little place to stay, it’s inspired me to consider a similar project!
Very quiet, rural location! Great place to unwind and relax

Kurt & Heidi were amazing hosts! The Shed Retreat was truly a retreat….peaceful, beautiful, restful. We were greeted by their two lovely outdoor cats who became fast friends of ours. We sat around the bonfire practically all day, with the cozy outdoor lights on. We cooked over the bonfire, read, did puzzles, all while listening to the chickens in their coop. Highly recommend if you’re looking for a peaceful place to unplug!

we were so happy to find a small retreat to stay at, Kurt & Heidi are great people. Their kitty cats are adorable, it was warm and cozy and soft and easy. just like indiana, nature, and god should be. 💕🙏
loved it
Wonderful retreat for a quick getaway. The shed was cozy and the outdoor toilet was much better than I anticipated. We enjoyed our stay!
Kurt and Heidi are so kind. They even left a personalized welcome note! The shed retreat is the perfect place for a peaceful getaway. I hope to go back again soon!

The shed and its surrounding area looked beautiful with the different colored leaves that had come with the fall weather. The place was warm and relaxing and the area is quiet and peaceful. I appreciated the hosts always going the extra mile and making sure my stay was as enjoyable as possible. The shed really was a truly unique experience that I’d love to have again!

ANOTHER VERY MEMORABLE, completely enjoyable AirB&B experience less than two hours from home, in my own home state!
I didn’t have much time to read about this one ahead of time, but I booked it because I read “shed.” I’ve overnighted in just about every situation, but never a shed.
What I had for just one night was a very cozy, peaceful, and extremely enjoyable escape.
Thank you, Kurt & Heidi, for taking care of every detail and providing a haste-free experience in a lovely setting.
Loved this beautiful, little place! They allowed early check-in and since no one had booked the place after me, allowed me to stay later as well.
Phenomenal in every way.
Kurt and Heidi are excellent hosts! The place was peaceful and well taken care of. Highly recommend and plan to visit again.

This cozy little place is on a beautiful property with beautiful big OLD trees. It is very comfortable and quiet. I slept in longer than I had in a long time! It is also close to town and the college. It was a very peaceful get away.
The cutest getaway, so cozy and felt like home. So serene and had all the amenities you would need. We will definitely be coming back!!

The setting is gorgeous, underneath these massive Sycamore trees. Lots of privacy. The two cats were very welcoming and friendly and reminded us of our own. Would have loved to stay a bit longer and walk the trail and see the river.
The Shed Retreat is lovely, private and peaceful. I enjoyed my stay and would recommend this quaint little place without hesitation.

The shed is wonderful and the hosts are extremely kind and considerate. Everything is very thought out and quaint. It is extremely comfortable and in a very peaceful area :) I would definitely stay again. Thanks for everything!

We had a fantastic stay. The Shed is welcoming, peaceful, quaint, well kept and there are 2 friendly cats on the property which was such a special treat! The hosts are extremely prompt in responding and friendly. Highly recommend. ,

If you are looking peaceful surroundings in a rustic setting, you will love the Shed retreat. We learned some interesting things about foot pump faucets and camp toilets while enjoying the lovely antique furnishings, suoer comfortable mattress and fleece bathrobes. Kurt and Hiedi, your prayers for us were answered.

Kurt and Heidi were very hospitable, going "above and beyond," providing cupcakes as a welcome gift. They described their place accurately - including the story of the space, the neighboring chicken coop, and the camp toilet and outdoor shower (and instructions to use the community aquatic center as another option for showering). It's a lovely, peaceful, place for those who enjoy being close to nature :)
Nice and quiet place for a weekend getaway.
I loved the Mexican restaurant down the road, very quaint and quiet, great price for a great place. LOVED THE CATS
a nice stay. Sadly we only had 1 night and a quick turn around. Hopefully we can return with time to actually relax.
Such a charming and relaxing place to stay. Hope to visit again!
Such a great place! Cozy and relaxing. It has an outdoor toilet and shower but that’s part of the experience.
The shed retreat is a hidden gem. Lots of greenery, privacy, cozy, rustic and comfortable shed. There are things to do if you want or just enjoy the peaceful retreat and hide away.
I drive the Amish places and Im looking forward to stay again. Peaceful and restful. Thank u the stay and the muffins was so good.

this is a very quiet and beautifully decorated place... accompanied by cats and fireflies...the bed is really very comfortable... Kurt and heidi, are very nice and very responsive to our requests ... really a location as we love them.... and thank you for the tasty muffins when we arrive.
just the place I needed for my getaway weekend.
Very cute shed with a welcoming relaxing atmosphere
A genuinely special experience

This was the perfect place to relax and enjoy some peace and quiet. It matched the description and the trail down to the river was a nice bonus. Kurt and Heidi have restored this shed to something very enjoyable and needed for people wanting a retreat from the busyness of life.
Enjoyed our stay very much

We really enjoyed our stay at the Shed Retreat. Although close to the house, it felt like a completely private little oasis. We spent a lot of time sitting outside, and it was very peaceful and relaxing. All the nice added touches were much appreciated. The bed was incredibly comfortable as well.
The shed is a great getaway from city life!

Though we live in the country surrounded by trees with a creek running through it, the Shed Retreat, though similar to our usual surroundings similar, was much more! If you want a peaceful, cozy spot to tuck away from the buzz of everyday life, you can't go wrong with Kurt and Heidi's place. It's close to town amenities yet located in country surroundings within a quiet neighborhood we felt safe in. We weren't sure what the compost toilet experience would be like, but it was super user-friendly, no pun intended, and only added to the experience. It's clear Kurt and Heidi put thoughtful effort into making their place and our stay special. Everything was as advertised and then some.
The Shed Retreat is a great little space! Exactly as described and hosts go the extra mile to welcome guests and extend hospitality.
The shed is cute and cozy. would happily stay again

Had a lovely stay here and commuted to Fort Wayne during the day for a conference. It was cozy, relaxing, and pleasant and Kurt and Heidi were able to supply us with a few things we had forgotten to bring. We especially loved the fresh eggs and the fire pit!

The Shed Retreat was clean, adorable and so cozy for our Anniversary celebration getaway. Just what we were looking for. Kurt & Heidi were very accommodating & helped us with a last minute reservation.
Wow! What a great location and such a cozy place. Perfect for a girls weekend. Every detail was so thoughtful and made us feel so loved. Will definitely stay again!

The Shed Retreat is a perfect and cozy retreat to get away from the business of the world and just rest and humble yourself in nature. The cats are super friendly and greeted me each morning which was very sweet. Unfortunately, my stay called for wet and cold weather but I think the fireplace and the extended grounds close to the creek would've been a great place to enjoy the surroundings and reflect on life. I really enjoyed the photo book detailing how the shed came to be, as well as perusing the several games and books inside the cabinet. This would be a great getaway for couples as there were several books/games available to re-get to know each other and share with each other. I would definitely recommend this location for couples. It's also close to Warsaw which has a cute lake and stores to explore.
Second time staying in this oasis and I can’t wait to plan my next time. My favorite retreat!
A very cute place to stay, alot to do and enjoy on the property. Kurt is a super host, very informative and willing to go out of his way to help you out.

The Shed was wonderful :) The cats were so sweet and followed us around everywhere we went. The outdoor shower was an adventure at first glance but it was easy to setup and was one of the most refreshing showers I’ve had. The sounds of nature mixed with the natural light is its own sensation.
Thank you Kurt and Heidi for having us!
Excellent stay. Wonderful little place to rejuvenate.

It was my revisit to this place. Even the second time, I felt this place was unique and pleasant calm stay in the woods. Especially walking down into the creek and spending time around with forest environment was amazing. Always liked welcome muffins by Kurt and Heidi and also good time with the kitten around. Also attended a music concert at downtown which was a very easy drive and a fun place to hang around. Definitely recommended place for anyone's stay
Very nice and clean place
A very cute and cozy place to stay
The location was ideal and the amenities and communication were above and beyond. I highly recommend and definitely know we will be back :)

The glowing reviews are absolutely justified. As hosts, as a location, the amenities, the comfortable and cosy touches… this is an incredible place to stay. I would highly recommend the Shed Retreat to anyone thinking about staying there.

This is by far one of the best airbnbs that we have ever stayed at (we are counting our stays here by the handfuls at this point!). A simple getaway, thoughtful hosts, a unique setting, and absolutely adorable accommodations. This visit called for poor weather, so Kurt and Heidi set up the garage with some indoor games for the kids and I to play so we wouldn’t be bored—I call that definitely going above and beyond. It was well appreciated and they truly are the sweetest hosts. 100% would recommend. Also to note is the adorable downtown area, library with community garden, several Little Free Libraries in the area, and a bomb thrift shop that my daughter and I discovered. ♥️

The Shed Retreat is a very unique, clean, and comfortable stay! The homemade muffins were delicious and the bed is super comfortable. It's the perfect little place for a weekend adventure to North Manchester and neighboring towns. We found antiques and oddities, a covered bridge, a waterfall, ice cream, and a great bar for hamburgers and rings! Plus, it has been decades since I won a game of Battleship! Truly enjoyed our stay and the story/pictures of how this place came to be. Thank you, Kurt and Heidi!

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the Shed Retreat. It was evident that a lot of care and thought has gone into making this little space as comfortable and welcoming as possible. For us, this stay checked all of our boxes, particularly being simple and affordable. The bathroom situation (toilet and shower outdoors) was no problem for us, and even added to the fun of our stay. I found myself especially appreciative of the house robes and shoes provided for our use - they made walking to the bathroom or using the shower a lot cleaner and easier than it could have been. Although we didn't meet Kurt and Heidi face to face during our stay, they were always quick to respond to questions, and available to help. I could certainly see us staying at the Shed Retreat again in the future. As parents it was the perfect little space to get away and reconnect for a couple days, without breaking the budget. We really appreciate what Kurt and Heidi have done with the space, and love that they've made it available.

It was wonderful staying at the Shed Retreat! I literally made my annual retreat there (8 days) and found the setting and solitude perfect for letting my heart open up to the Lord's gracious love. Thanks to Heidi and Kurt for being such lovely hosts and providing the space (both physical and existential) I needed to discover how very loved I am by God.

The Shed was just as described and it was a wonderful relaxing time for my husband and I to just get away and unplug for a few days! The location was great we did some hiking and there was even a little festival in town on Friday night that we happened upon. The bed was comfy and the cupcakes were a wonderful treat!! Thank you so much Kurt and Heidi for making such a peaceful getaway!!

Kurt and Heidi have such a beautiful place and I highly recommend going there for some well deserved relax time. They were such thoughtful hosts with all the signage around, and creating a space that feels so homey. The cupcakes and robes were definite bonuses :-). My heart and soul needed this place when I stayed and I am so thankful I was able to reconnect with what matters most there. Thank y'all. <3

An absolutely WONDERFUL place to stay! So calming and peaceful to hear nature and the town is quaint and well kept too! I was worried about the shower and toilet but both were not bad! Shower was warm and relaxing to hear the trees and birds around you. Hosts were friendly and so were all the animals! Would definitely recommend!
Highly recommend staying here! It’s such a cozy and relaxing getaway.
Clean, quiet, comfortable!
Cozy, clean, quiet! Good value, good hosts!

Absolutely place is amazing and perfectly great. One can completely feel about privacy and have a great relaxing time here. With a lot of trees around with a nice trail and fireplace, this place makes you feel like somewhere in deep woods.
A very calm and friendly kitten around makes a greater feeling and morning wake-up call from roosters. The place is cozy and perfectly cleaned by Kurt & Heidi. With provided few kitchens and game accessories it will be great fun.
As the trail leads into a nice creek in the backyard, it will be a great time to spend around in the entire day time in the woods. Definitely love to visit this place again. Bottom line, if you are a true lover of nature then this is the PERFECT PLACE for your pleasant stay....!!!!!
Our 3rd visit and its wonderful every time! We love the peaceful space Kurt and Heidi have made for their guests and we look forward to the little treats left for us. We cant wait for our next visit!
Such a wonderful place to get away I wish we were able to stay a little longer but visiting family we didn’t get too definitely worth the stay! Will definitely be coming back.
Always a nice stay. Enjoy sitting by the fire and enjoying the nature.
Exactly what we needed. Such an amazing space

Liked it so much, I stayed a second time! Hosts were friendly and the space was perfect, just like the first time I stayed. Unfortunately, I just had time to catch some sleep before hitting the road early the next day. Would have liked to stay a few days to unwind! Maybe next time.

We loved our stay with Kurt and Heidi. They have done an amazing job on with the creation of The Shed Retreat. Everything about our stay was perfect to the twinkle lights at night to the chickens and kitties outside. You won’t regret staying here in the cutest of towns. My husband and I will be back!
A lovely place to spend some time.

What a great spot! The “shed” was way more than I was asking for. Comfortable and restful spot (I think I might have slept better than at home). Friendly and helpful hosts made sure that I had everything I needed. They even had cupcakes waiting when I got there! Wonderful people and great value!
We have stayed here a handful of times and will continue to do so. Great hospitality, clean, unique, and a great little downtown area to check out with super friendly locals. A+
Highly recommend! so quiet, clean and beautiful!
The perfect weekend getaway! This place is so cozy with communicative and respectful hosts. I especially loved hanging out with the two cats and spending a sunny afternoon by the creek!
it’s a nice cozy place if you’re looking for a stay and i would highly suggest it, well worth it
A perfectly peaceful place!

What a cute and cozy little apartment in a peaceful setting, complete with a couple of really friendly cats and lovely chickens! The shed itself was warm, inviting and smelled wonderful inside. The hosts leave you to your own devices and honor privacy, while still responding quickly to communication through the Airbnb app. The toilet arrangement (a camp toilet outside and one you can take inside) most certainly isn’t for everyone. It was a little hard to handle at times, but certainly didn’t take away from my total experience. Also, because of the time of year, the outdoor shower on premises was not available (there are showers available at a local rec facility for a modest fee). If you can put up with these minor points, I would enthusiastically recommend this location to anyone visiting this area!
Cozy!

The Shed is a perfect getaway spot. If you are looking to relax, this is the place! Cozy and Comfy!!
Perfect place to read a book, listen to music or take in the beautiful creation around you.
What a unique and quiet place! The Shed Retreat is a gem, and I hope to visit again.

Great place for a little get away. A quaint goat barn turned into an escape I’ll never forget. I felt tranquility and peacefulness listening to the creek babble as I took in the vibrant Fall colors. The crunch of the leaves a few steps down a cute wooded path made me reminisce my childhood growing up in Michigan. At night, the fire pit area was illuminated and beautified by adorning lights- like fireflies of summers past. The kittens sat in my lap purring me awake the next morning while enjoying coffee out front on the deck. Kurt and Heidi hit the nail on the head with the details of my new escape. They pray for those who find their way to the Shed. And pray for you while you’re here. And my soul could feel their healing words. Thank you so much for sharing this sacred space.
Loved staying here. the atmosphere was cozy & peaceful. I felt very welcomed and the animals were such a great surprise. My son misses it already!

Great getaway location! My husband and I did a little "retreat" here for a weekend to shut our phones off and be in nature! Perfect location for that purpose. We enjoying spending an afternoon swimming at the fitness center up the road and eating Mexican at El Mezquite. The hosts do an excellent job at making the smaller space feel "homey." You get your own section by their house that feels like your own retreat center for your time there. Enjoy!

This is "luxury camping" at it's finest. The rustic serenity cannot be adequately described with words, but must be experienced. The site is peaceful, the chickens are friendly (Fresh eggs for breakfast!) , and the cats are full of love. There is peace to be had here...

The restroom situation is odd at first. But there is something soothing about taking a shower outdoors. It is private and tidy. More of a campers paradise than a hotel. While the two cats are quite friendly and affectionate. I would keep them away if you try to cook. The little doesn't have a lot of manners. All in all a great place for the price.
Cutest property with the sweetest owners! We loved sitting by the fire pit with the cats. We will definitely be back!

The name says it all! If you are looking to feel far away from it all and experience the country and pampered camping this is it, the atmosphere was completely relaxing and laid back we will be returning!!

Lovely place with beautiful trees and green grass near a creek. Ideal for young people. We are in our late 70’s and missed the creature comforts of indoor plumbing. However the weather was warm and outside showers were adequate and exhilarating. It made us feel young and adventurous. Kurt and Heidi were gracious hosts.
Great place. Very relaxing. Ingenious outdoor shower.

Kurt and Heidi were terrific hosts. While some parts of the space were a shared, I still had all the privacy I wanted. I was greeted with muffins on the bed and a few beers in the fridge. I would definitely stay there again.

We’ve stayed in a lot of tiny homes or glamping type of experiences and this was probably one of our favorites. The tiny house was tucked away and felt pretty private. The outdoor space with string lights was perfect for a campfire. There were so many things to do that were perfect for a relaxing getaway. There was also a very friendly kitten when we stayed so that was a plus. We enjoyed our time here and I’m sure we will be back.

We loved this cozy little retreat. It’s a great “glamping” spot. The outdoor shower and bathroom were very clean and great for being outdoors. We had fun playing games from the cupboard. Also, the setting was lovely!

The Shed Retreat is a little room in a beautifully peaceful setting out in the country. It's kind of a cross between a guest cottage and camping. The Shed itself is relatively close to Kurt & Heidi's house, yet is situated so it's surprisingly secluded and private, so it really IS perfect for a retreat.
Personally, my favorite part about my 2-night stay was probably just sitting inside, reading, writing, and coloring, with the windows open to let in the cool, fresh air. I also enjoyed an evening campfire (ate too many s'mores), walking down to the creek and the green grassy area (early a.m. squats & lunges), gathering fresh eggs, and practicing some "kitten yoga" (didn't know that was a thing, but the little grey guy thought I should try it).
The outside restroom is relatively convenient, clean, and comfortable. I feel that guests should be aware in advance that they are asked to do some of their own "maintenance" of the camp toilet, and that was not at all a problem for me.
Heidi and Kurt went out of their way to help me with a problem that came up (which was not related to their property), and I'm so appreciative of their assistance.
I didn't experience much in the town of North Manchester, but I did visit the History Museum, which was interesting and informative, and the Main View restaurant where I had a delicious lunch.
I hope I get an opportunity to stay at The Shed sometime in the future!
So cute and cozy! Super clean and neat inside and out. Kurt and Heidi were so hospitable and over all just super lovely people. Would 100% stay again and recommend.

Amazing space to relax, unwind, and clear your mind. The cats made the experience more special! The space itself was clean and cozy. Perfect for couples or as a solo trip. So much love was put into The Shed Retreat and it shows. Thank you so much, Kurt and Heidi! (The apple muffins that were waiting for us when we arrived were such a sweet touch and delicious!)

Would definitely recommend this place for a pleasant stay. Do use the fire place at the barn as well as at the creek.
We had a great time hanging around late nights, playing and some refreshing time.

I had a terrific experience at the Shed. Went looking for a weekend away to enjoy the pleasures of camping but also have a bed and room at night. My kind of glamping! Kurt and Heidi were so thoughtful - welcome cupcakes and a note on the bed when I arrived. The room was comfortable and adequate. Firewood ready for a campfire. Instructions and anything I needed to know was communicated well. They were sweet to say hello and visit but also considerate to give me space. Lots of options for simple fun. I checked out the fitness center one day. Walked downtown North Manchester for ice cream another day. And enjoyed reading and several cups of coffee by the fire. The chickens, fresh eggs and adorable kitties just added to the charm of the experience. Price was right and well worth it! Thanks Kurt and Heidi!
Everything about The Shed is awesome. Comfortable and cute inside and out. This was our third visit and we will be back again.

This place is so cozy and homey! It was the perfect retreat for our anniversary. There was even a bottle of sparkling apple cider and amazing cupcakes to help us celebrate. They have everything here that you need to make your stay enjoyable. We are planning our next trip in the fall some time. We’d love to come back and enjoy this place longer and get to interact with the owners more. The cats, as everybody mentions, were just an added bonus!

This was one of my favorite places I have stayed. It was so cute and had so many nice additions. Honestly it was so amazing that I got to love on kittens at night and in the morning. That was my favorite addition. It was also nice to have some devotion books because my husband and I got to do it before we went to bed. Also, the cupcakes were awesome!!

The shed is super cute and quaint! We came to stay for just one evening for a wedding nearby. Kurt was so helpful and kind. Loved waking up to the sounds of a nature and enjoying some coffee on the shed porch.
Very charming and comfy. Great for a couple of nights.

Just, wow! It is clear how much thought and love has gone into this little retreat. It was absolutely beautiful and had everything you could have needed and more! Kurt and Heidi have a beautiful property and yes, there were kitties! The kitties were such an added blessing and so adorable. The shed was stunning, as was the yard and little creek in the back! We have never been camping before and this little glamping getaway was a perfect introduction, featuring an outdoor toilet and shower. The toilet was easy to use and very clean, as was the shower. This was everything we were looking for and we cant wait to be back!

What an amazing place! Kitten snuggles, fish nibbling your toes in the stream, beautiful surroundings, peace and quiet. We absolutely loved our stay, and the cupcakes ,with the sparkling juice, waiting for us was a great touch. So much love and care in this little space, and a wonderful place to celebrate our anniversary.
Nice accomadations, beautiful setting. The kayak trip was very nice. Great value.

This is a beautiful space. Relaxing and rejuvenating. Heidi and Kurt have put their hearts into it to make it cute, comfortable and a spot carved out for your soul and heart to rest. My husband gave me this trip as a beautiful Mother’s Day present. I went kayaking, played with the kittens, napped in the hammock, had coffee under the trees, listened to the silence and the sound of the River and rode a bike into town for dinner. It was a gift and a blessing in many ways. I highly recommend the space and the hosts.
This place is absolutely loving. If you like camping you'll enjoy the scenery. If you're looking to experience something different and unique this is something for you.
The Shed Retreat was beautiful, clean and so restful. I plan to return!
Awesome space with cute kitties

If you like "glamping" this place is for you! It was an oasis of serenity and beauty, nestled in a sweet garden of hostas and shady trees. The chickens are near the parking and their sweet soft noises greeted us as we entered the very short path to the beautiful converted goat shed. If those goats could see this place now, they'd be in awe of it! The decor inside is darling and it had everything you needed, including A/C, electricity, a nice comfy chair, coffee table and love seat sitting area. The large bed was extremely comfy and the pillows were perfect. Rubber slippers, towels and bathrobes were provided near the back door for use in the very private outside shower. There is a camp toilet which along with the foot pump sink is part of the "glamping" experience that made this a fun adventure. From the cupcakes that greeted us to the fresh eggs we cooked in the barn for breakfast, we couldn't have asked for more! Oh! We also were over the moon visiting with the sweetest momma cat and her five adorable kittens!!! If we could have adopted any, we would have begged for at least two. It will be one of the best places you can find to stay in Indiana and I guarantee you won't want to leave!
This is a true gem. Even just a night left me refreshed and with a bit more peace. Everything is as described, and Kurt and Heidi were extremely thoughtful and kind in their design and communication.
Another great stay…three bookings in the same week (unplanned!) should say something about how awesome this location is!!

Staying at the Shed retreat was relaxing! If you need a getaway and a place to refresh this is a great spot! Sitting out and watching the chickens and the kittens made for a lovely evening. We wish our stay could have been longer but we only were there for one night. We hope to go back maybe for a weekend sometime!

Great hosts with a clean and serene space. I stayed with three of my kids one night and knew I wanted to bring my younger two and the host was able to immediately accommodate that without a problem. I HIGHLY recommend this location and it’s definitely a new regular for us. ♥️🐓🥚🙌🏼💕

We absolutely LOVE this location. The hosts are beyond friendly, the cats (and now kittens as well!!!) are just adorable and so playful, and the setting is peaceful and just enough off of the beaten path to feel sort of camp-y in a very glamp-y way. My 15 year old daughter didn’t want to come previously because of the outdoor restroom (🙄😐). She, for some reason, chose to come this time and now said she will come every chance she gets. If this place can win over the pickiest teenager in the world, I’d say it’s whatever level comes after “winner”! 😋😉💕

Great place! This place is super cozy and beautifully designed. Don't be fooled by the little door; it's actually very spacious inside (and I'm 6'4")! We were even greeted with some amazing and unexpected cupcakes upon our arrival, which hit the spot after a long drive. The setting is absolutely beautiful; we fell in love with the kitties and the hens. And there is a great woods that leads to a river out back. Couldn't have asked for a better place to stay for our visit to North Manchester. Kurt was easy to get a hold of and super helpful when we had questions. Thanks so much!
Wonderful magical place! Friendly hosts, comfortable setup, and kittens. What’s not to love?
If you are here to shed your worries away, spending more time with peace and quietness that nature has to offer, then you are at the right place. Will come back again for cute kittens 😁

This retreat is even better than the photos show! Super cozy, cool on hot days, warmer on chilly mornings. Camping toilet is just fine as is the outdoor shower. Loved ever second of my stay and the kittens roaming around with their mama are just an added bonus!
clean place. kind, courteous, and helpful hosts
One of the best rooms I’ve ever stayed in. The hosts are clear, clean, and friendly. If you want a rustic retreat that still feels like home, look no further!

Kurt and Heidi were wonderful hosts. The space was clean and comfortable, and there were several amenities to enjoy. We got to play with their cats outside and feed the chickens. It was something much different than we were used to and it was a nice couple getaway for us. We will definitely be back in the future and we couldn’t recommend it more!
So cute and clean!!! Perfect getaway

Kurt and Heidi were great hosts! They were great and answering our questions and offering suggestions for activities to enjoy throughout our stay. It was so peaceful and we will definitely stay again next time we are in Indiana!
Amazing spot! Quaint and cozy. The scenery is unlike any other I have experienced as far as air bnb is concerned. I highly recommend this amazing spot!

If you’ve got an inkling this place is for you — IT IS! Man, what a rejuvenating experience even just for 1 night away. The grounds were more gorgeous and the space even better than I could ever expect. SO homey and very close to all you need (not far at all from the downtown area of N Manchester). Can’t wait to return!

Our stay was excellent from playing on the trails and exploring the water to the sweetheart cats loving on us to gathering our own eggs for breakfast to the cute little fire pit and homemade collie (yum!). We will definitely be back—my new favorite AirBNB! ❤️🙌🏼
Lovely little cabin getaway! Truly puts the “glam” in glamping
Amazing peaceful place if you're looking for some quiet time. love the cats:)
The Shed is very peaceful. It is perfect for a personal or a couples retreat.
Very cute space.
Great place

Such a fun stay - Kurt and Heidi have put great thought and work into making their place so relaxing. Communication was quick and great through the process. Plenty of small touches at the property. We did not take advantage of all of the amenities but it was nice to have so many different activities offered. Great value for a relaxing weekend trip. Look forward to putting together a return visit.
Kurt and Heidi’s place is so unique and was such a treat to stay in! The quaint, farmhouse styled shed was so cozy. We love the roaming cats and kittens! Highly recommend this spot 💜

The shed is a great getaway! Close to a little creek, quaint, cozy, and quiet. It was the perfect thing I needed to get a little time for myself. There were plenty of blankets to get cozy, all the amenities were provided, and I found the outdoor bathroom a fun little adventure. If you’re not a fan of cats, though, this may not be the spot for you. There are a ton of friendly cats (and kittens) that accompanied me throughout my time outside. I found them endearing, but someone afraid (or allergic) to cats may find that less than relaxing. Definitely would recommend this spot!!

We enjoyed the woodsy location of The Shack Retreat. It was cozy and decorated beautifully. Even though close to the main home, it was still very private. We were able to go for a walk and enjoy the kittens playing outside. There are many restaurants and stores within a few minutes' drive. We will definitely recommend to our local friends for a day away!

I never knew I could love Indiana before coming here. Everything LOOKS as pictured, but the FEEL is way better than any words can describe. I'm definitely bringing my daughter next time I come back. Most amazing solo Airbnb experience ever. 💜
This was a great place. Exactly as described. Lots of chickens and cats. Everything was well done and easy. Thank you!

The love and effort Kurt and Heidi put into this experience shows the moment you arrive. I could write about so many things but I’ll keep it simple. All around it is a great place to get away and connect with your partner and forget about daily life for a moment. Loved every second of it!
You need to go here. Best air bnb I’ve been to in a long time!
What a gem here in the middle of a peaceful atmosphere! We loved it!

This is our second trip to the Shed and it was just as awesome as our first time. We love the relaxing space and cozy fire. We did a kayak trip again and enjoyed every minute of it. The thoughtful touches Kurt and Heidi have done just make this one of our favorite spots!

We loved our stay at The Shed Retreat! We were in town for a wedding and only 15 minutes away from the venue. Such a great little spot with amazing decorations & privacy! Coming from country living myself, I loved walking past the chickens & having kitty friends that love back scratches! We actually really enjoyed the outdoor shower and bathroom area. It will kind of catch you off guard at first, but it had a way of taking you into an even more rustic retreat. I will recommend this place whenever asked.

This is a great place to stay. I have been there about 4 times. The energy is very positive and healing. It is indeed a nice retreat. It is kind of like glamping. There are many cats and chickens. You can ride bikes or go kayaking. North Manchester is a very pleasing rural community. Very amenable to a romantic getaway, you can get really close to your partner here.

Kurt and Heidi were wonderful hosts! We loved relaxing in the hammocks, spending time by the campfire, and getting fresh eggs from the coop! There were so many small touches that made the trip extra special too--like a welcome note with homemade cookies and a note on a book of questions inviting us to get to know each other better. My wife fell in love with Nala, one of their kittens, who was a great hammock snuggle buddy! Kurt was especially attentive and communicative--transporting our farmer's market goods (There is a wonderful farmer's market in town on Saturday mornings!) for us when he noticed that we had bought a little too much to carry back with us to the shed with the bikes that he lent us. We also really enjoyed, and recommend, the kayaking trip! (This would be at a small extra cost and includes kayaks, paddles, life jackets and drop off / pick up.) It was all just what we needed to get away from everyday life!
AN AMAZING EXPERIENCE.
Wow! My husband and I took a long weekend here and have already started telling our friends about the The Shed Retreat. Our only fear is that it will already be booked when we want to come back!

There just arent enough words to describe how wonderful of an experience we had! Kurt and Heidi are amazing hosts and created a peaceful space for their visitors! We plan on going back again soon since we just loved our time spent there.

This ranks among one of our favorite Airbnb's we have stayed in! For a quick two-day anniversary trip to Winona Lake, Kurt and Heidi's place was exactly what we hoped for. Now that we know about this amazing place, we hope to be back in the future for a longer visit.
An excellent place to stay! Cute, clean, and lots of fun.

Think "Glamping" only better. Kurt and Heidi's Shed retreat was just what my husband and I needed for a few days to rest and refresh. We enjoyed the fire pit, the kittens, and the secluded space "away from it all." Kurt was very accommodating when we Kayaked, and they were fantastic at communicating. The little touches of care in the shed were perfect! The unique art work, the extra throw blankets and robes, the coffee and sugar, and the cookies and note - this stay exceeded our expectations! We would love to return!
Great, relaxing place to escape to!

Absolutely perfect! The shed retreat was awesome! The hosts are quick to respond, the space is comfortable and stylish! We loved sitting by the fire pit , loved the kittens and chickens, and all of the personal touches! We were able to go kayaking (last minute) and thoroughly enjoyed it! Showering under the stars was fantastic! And the welcome cookies were very much appreciated!
We have stayed at many Air bnbs and this is one of our favorites!
I had a wonderful time during my mom-cation getaway for the night. It was much needed and everything I was looking for. The indoor and outdoor settings made for a peaceful stay.
This was my 3rd time staying at the Shed Retreat. It is a very homey and uplifting experience- I love it here.

This place was an amazing retreat into nature and simple living. If you need to clear your mind, get in touch with yourself, focus on art or meditation; this is the place for you. The hosts were so kind and the amenities were unbelievable for the price and quality of the place. I recommend bringing your own grill and food to cook on site. There is a great farmers market in the town on Saturday morning, but otherwise healthy convenient food choices are slim. The camping toilet is really the only rustic part of the amenities so you should be prepared to take care of your own waste. There are some beautiful state parks in the area you can drive to for hiking trails and nature time. The best part by far was meeting the hosts and going on the kayak adventure; they provided the kayak and the drop-off/pick-up. The river was beautiful with a good mix of challenging and relaxing sections which made for a perfect true adventure. Thank you so much Heidi and Kurt for the love and kindness you put into this retreat.
It was a great place with lots of love and hospitality shown! We would stay there again if we are in the area
This was my second time staying at the Shed, I love this place!

Kurt and Heidi are great hosts and the shed was perfect with so many personal touches. We loved all the helpful notes and signs. The country setting was so nice and peaceful and we thoroughly enjoyed the cats. The bed was super comfy. Highly recommended!

If you are in a search for a small little retreat this is the perfect place! We didn’t do the extra activities such as using the bikes, outdoor games, kayaking or the fire pit. Which tells you that this place is Loaded with options! But we will sure return to do so! Location is great, very quite and peaceful. The Shed Retreat was very clean and the instructions at location were very easy to read and follow. Kurt and Heidi definitely thought of all the little details which makes this place even more special. Can’t forget that there were extra companions, the kittens on the property made it feel more like home. The outdoor shower and bathroom are very easy to use, it is truly an experience. My husband and I can’t thank Kurt and Heidi enough for their hospitality. If you decide to give this place a chance, you will not regret it!! Go for it and give it a try! Have fun!

Kurt and Heidi went above and beyond for us. We came for our first anniversary and spent our time feeling so welcome and surrounded by kitties, nature, and chickens. It’s like staying in a luxurious little hobbit hole. They let us rent their own kayaks to go kayaking and dropped us off and picked us up for a great price. We got fresh, warm eggs from the chicken coop for breakfast and had a great fire surrounded by fairy lights. We couldn’t have chosen a better place to spend our anniversary :)

Heidi was a great host! The check in was very easy. The place was very clean. We loved how quiet and relaxing the property was. The location offers a nice trail in the back that leads to a great spot to start a fire. Both her and her husband took care of all of our needs and are very grateful. Great place to spend time with the Lord! Everything was well maintained and kept. Would recommend to any couple who wants to get away or even an individual or family looking for a cool spot to relax. Thank you Heidi and Kurt
Enjoyed our stay!

This was a beautiful, private retreat in the country❤️ The shed was like a little cabin in the woods. Everything was clean and the host were very welcoming. You can sit out around the fire in the evening with the kittens. We loved our stay there!
Randy and Ben
Quaint little place. Hosts offer a lot of extras. Peaceful.
This place has special loving energy and all you need for a relaxing and peaceful retreat in the country.
It was a great spot for what I needed! Kurt and Heidi went above and beyond with their hospitality.

What a unique, quaint, quiet place!! We really enjoyed our time there!! It was very cozy with most of what my fiancé and I needed for a quiet love bird weekend together! It did get a bit chilly at night but that made for closer cuddling! We didn't use the cold outdoor shower, to cold, but did go to the rec center which was quite enjoyable with the pool and hot tub!!
